title: Make MKL_INCLUDE_DIR not found error nicer
body_html:
When building without the conda mkl-include package, the following output happens:
https://gist.github.com/zou3519/eb2520eb041866be4bfc499b602d7539
which might confuse users who don't read the README (like myself, my apologies).

Related: there's a section in setup.py where one can set python build dependencies but I'm not sure if mkl-include is a python module that can be imported in python

cc @SsnL

body:
When building without the conda `mkl-include` package, the following output happens:
https://gist.github.com/zou3519/eb2520eb041866be4bfc499b602d7539
which might confuse users who don't read the README (like myself, my apologies).

Related: there's a section in setup.py where one can set python build dependencies but I'm not sure if `mkl-include` is a python module that can be imported in python

cc @SsnL
